docs.title: Vision
docs.text: Plants are cool. We should make more of them, and give people the tools to do that also.

docs.title: What is a TinyFarm
docs.text: Think tinyhomes, but like, for farms and stuff.

docs.title: What are we doing?
docs.text:
Were trying to do some stuff.

  • set up a tinyfarm in a shipping container
  • try out components in standardized test environments
  • build tools for simulation of tinyfarms
